channel.title: Android on ExampleSite
channel.description: Recent content in Android on ExampleSite

item.title: How to populate RecyclerView with data from server
item.description: What is the goal? In this article, I will review how to create a custom RecyclerView, how to fetch the data from the external API using Retrofit, and display the result in the RecyclerView. This tutorial will mainly consist of 3 steps. In step #1 I will design an individual row layout, in step #2 will create a RecyclerView adapter, in step #3 fetch the data from the server and feed it to RecyclerView.
